articles.title: Crucial Launches Its Fastest Ever M.2 SSD - PCMag
articles.description: The P5 is a PCIe 3.0 x4 M.2 SSD capable of reaching 3,400MB/s read speeds and 3,000MB/s writes.
articles.content:
